title: Test
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP growth compared to previous year, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Max GDP growth compared to previous year about 4.14 was recorded at Year 2017
Min GDP growth compared to previous year about 2.02 was recorded at Year 2015
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP growth compared to previous year, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2024.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2017.
